Looking for Blood

About

SaNgUe - A Centralized Blood Bank Management System.

  • 2012-2015

    Our Humble Beginnings

    SaNgUe was inaugrated on 9th May 2012 by Prof.Sarju.
    SaNgue enforces Drug And Cosmetic Act , National blood policy standards and guidelines ensuring proper collection and donation, effective management and monitoring the quality and quantity of the donated blood.

  • March 2011

    An Agency is Born
